text: Anatoliy Tymoshchuk (born 30 March 1979) is a former Ukrainian football player. He played for clubs such as Bayern Munich, Zenit St Petersburg, and Shakhtar Donetsk. He also played for the Ukraine national team, and he is their most capped player with 144 appearances. He currently is an assistance manager for Zenit St Petersburg. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League Cup Europe Super Cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps
